userreviews.userReview: More pleaseWhat's up with these little short stories. If writing a long one isn't your thing write a series. Just when it was getting good. Hope there is more coming to this story.

description: A scientist secretly delves into warfare and unknowingly releases hell on earth when the dead begin to rise and behave in vile ways... the same disease that resembles rabies: cannibalismBethan Green longs for peace and solitude but then disaster strikes, smashing her quiet life into a million pieces. Bethan stares helplessly when her roommate returns home and tells her the horrific story of the outside world. The dead have risen, people are dying, and the only problem is they aren’t staying dead but are returning with a hunger for flesh!The living start to flee to save their own lives while Bethan starts the journey to find her room mate’s brother, Johnson. Who she believes can help her and keep her alive.Johnson is bad, his boss wants someone dead and so he is obliged to assist. He enters the house where this young lad lives and finds the most gruesome scene of bodies. Every dead body he sees returns back to life, hungry to eat and destined to walk the earth. Will Bethan and Johnson meet? Will they be able to survive the virus that has hit their small town and the larger city?
title: Reign of the Zombie
